name: Mutant
description:
We are an ecosystem of solutions that transform the consumer experience end-to-end.

At Mutant, we embrace your service, sales, and relationship challenges, generating real results. We combine technology with human and artificial intelligence to deliver the best features in ChatBot, Virtual Service Agents, Cognitive Intelligence, Multichannel, and many others.

We are more than 3,500 Mutants, present in 10 countries.Every year, we make more than 10 billion interactions with our customers. 

Caixa Econômica Federal, Petrobras, Espaço Laser, Neo Energia,  Autopass, Kroton, Femme, and Estácio are some of our main customers.
focus_areas: Sales,  Marketing, Charge, Customer Service,  Winback, Retention
